website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably-priced set of PDGA-approved discs.
pros: These rugged discs work well for beginners and have fun designs
Includes a putter, mid-range disc, and driver
cons: Many customers suspect that all three discs are the same mold

customer_reviews.title: Not REAL disc golf discs!
customer_reviews.text: These are a joke! Drivers, Mid-Range and Putter discs are DIFFERENT!!! These discs are all of the exact same mold. The only differences are the color and labeling. In reality, all three are molded mid-range. So, if you're looking for 3 Mid-Range discs, these are what you want. If you want a driver, mid and putter, they're NOT.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Little

customer_reviews.title: Starter discs
customer_reviews.text: Cheap discs for kids or beginners, all identical size, shape and weight. 3 heavy putters. Discs for grandma's outdoor toy bin, not for the serious disc golf player's bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jasper P. Jangles

customer_reviews.title: The discs fly well and were surprisingly inexpensive
customer_reviews.text: I am having a lot of fun with these discs. I still haven't quite gotten used to them, but it's just me I think. I believe it's a great deal for the price! Thank you very much!
customer_reviews.author: Igor

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: Its a harder plastic than some others. So it broke after hitting a few hard objects.
customer_reviews.author: Motog

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase for Beginners, very Easy to Learn to Throw, and Extremely Durable against Impacts!
customer_reviews.text: I was a total beginner when i bought this Set... now i have quite a bit of more experience, BUT i love these discs still... and they got beaten up really hard against many trees in my first Games, and they still fly perfectly, very Durable and properly priced... GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: CrazySte

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Work well. Lost the driver on first use but that is my husband and the ponds fault.
customer_reviews.author: Gwen

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: all the discs are the same thickness - putter same as mid range
customer_reviews.author: L. McGinn

customer_reviews.title: Well made product
customer_reviews.text: Discs arrived in good shape. They fly well. Worth the purchase even if you just want to try out Frisbee golf.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Phelps

customer_reviews.title: 5 star
customer_reviews.text: Awesome we have so much with frisbee golf thank you great product .. will order again from you ..5 star
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Mogck

customer_reviews.title: Driver and mid range turn over like a tomahawk when thrown with a hyzer
customer_reviews.text: Driver and mid range turn over like a tomahawk when thrown with a hyzer. I can drive the putter further than the driver and mid range!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic value
customer_reviews.text: The putter doesn't work as well as expected. The other two work perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Movie goer

product_meta.title: Verus Sports Expert Disc Golf Game Set
product_meta.description: Serious disc golfers, this is the set for you. This Expert Disc Golf Set from DMI Sports is engineered to meet all PDGA approved specifications and is approved by the PDGA. Set includes official PDGA spec driver, mid-range and putter, "Assault" driver, "Sabotage" midrange and "Vendetta" putter. Each disc is designed for optimum game performance.
feature_bullets: Engineered to meet all PDGA approved specs
Includes official PDGA spec putter, midrange and driver
Each disc is designed for optimum game performance

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
